Body:
l = TemplateLookup()
l.put_string('index',
    """
                <%inherit file="base"/>
                <%block name="header">
                    index header
                </%block>
            """
    )
l.put_string('base',
    """
            above
            <%block name="header">
                the header
            </%block>

            ${next.body()}
            below
        """
    )
self._do_test(l.get_template('index'), ['above', 'index header', 'below'],
    filters=result_lines)
